refnamediv.refpurpose: Return true if the RightInfo concern grants access to the resource

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Return &true; if the RightInfo concern grants access to the resource, &false; otherwise.

&reftitle.seealso;
Win32Service\RightInfo::__construct Win32Service\RightInfo::getRights Win32Service\RightInfo::isDenyAccess Win32Service\RightInfo::getFullUsername Win32Service\RightInfo::getUsername Win32Service\RightInfo::getDomain
